img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game set in a misty forest environment with tall trees and rocky cliffs. A character is seen running through the forest, holding a staff with a glowing red tip. The atmosphere is dark and mysterious, with scattered red particles in the air. On the left side of the screen, there are icons representing different abilities or items, and on the right side, there is a status bar indicating "Will" with a count of 29. The top right corner shows a score of +32 and a number 16, possibly indicating points or levels.
